channel.title: [Release]D3i7y's Super Easy Starter Base
channel.description:
im also d3i7y on runelocus ;) i released it eariler today
This Is My Starter Base Credits Go to -D3i7y / Brittiney -Roblovesbrit / Rob -SensualSex / Crisse
Ive Added -Damn Good Clan Chat in correct place where the 2 smilys are join leave and created and ban in clan chat and only the people joined see per the clan "test" chat unless they join ur chat -Full Anti Syi -Full Anti Null -Anti Ddos -::pure And ::Master Only Non Admin Commands Theres 10total -Starting Aera Lumbridge -Cleaned Auto Spawn Only the npcs needed -cleaned shops for eco* but has some items -the only tele ports are lumbridge/varrock/flador/camolet/adrgone for the rest there in lumbridge -Welcome Npc Talk ...Srarter Given on login -Starter is Small... Given On Login -All the names are now "ServerName" So you can change it Easily -Im adding a client soon as well for a great base -The Server java is 9.86kb -client java is 681kb
Pictures
Null D/c [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/deityserverbasenulldc.jpg[/img]
Syi And 3 Char Per Ip [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/deityserverbasenulldc2.jpg[/img]
Im posting a virus scan [IMG]http://i421.photobucket.com/albums/pp291/D3i7y/unlessvirusscanpic.jpg[/img]
And Finally The Download Sry MediaFire Only Unless You upload to more [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/jmjeitkxnww/d3i7yserverbase.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/jmjeitkxnww/d3i7yserverbase.rar[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/jmjeitkxnww/d3i7yserverbase.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/jmjeitkxnww/d3i7yserverbase.rar[/url]
Well Guys If You Need Any Help My Msn is [email]D3i7y@live.com[/email] And i also have a vps if someone is intrested in a great server hoster
